name: Innova Costa Rica
description:
INNOVA COSTA RICA was born with the goal of providing high-quality jobs, personalized service to our customers - many of them friends for years - and with the hope of overcoming the daily challenges of a market as changing as advertising.
We are a young team with experience in various fields of graphic design and web implementation embarked on a project that has been growing. We have offered our services to multiple companies in our country and beyond.
